Name: WavesLine Insider
Description: The mysterious contact, the Outcast ambushes, the driver you keep running into… everything is finally coming together.
QuestDesc: The mysterious contact, the Outcast ambushes, the driver you keep running into… everything is finally coming together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who are you? How did you find this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're the one who stopped the last carjacking too! So... we have a traitor!

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lahai-Roi... is breathtaking.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew it was you, Macknay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was always me, {PlayerName}. Thank you for ridding Lahai-Roi of Yvan and Stinge's band of Outcasts; they've plagued us for far too long.

Options.PlotLineKey: Time to tell me what's really going on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well then... {PlayerName}, what do you think of the view before us?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Majestic, captivating, mysterious... They're all words that befit Lahai-Roi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lahai-Roi's natural beauty is as you say. But look at Spacetrek–Bjartr Bridge. Signs of the Spacetrek Collective presence are everywhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Research Institute hangs in the sky, Startorch Academy stands on the ground, and roads criss-cross the land.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you're against the Spacetrek Collective coming here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not at all. I'm just reflecting on how different Lahai-Roi looks now compared to the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In a place like this, it's only natural that some Roya start questioning tradition and yearning for the wider world.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I work hard to help young people connect with the Spacetrek Collective—and at the same time, I want to stop their misguided yearnings from leading them down the wrong path.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why I went undercover among Yvan and Stinge's Outcasts. After I earned their trust, I passed along information about a fully loaded convoy to them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The plan was to deal with them in coordination with the Spacetrek Collective. But you arrived first and moved faster than we expected, sparing our people from casualties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. Thanks to you, the whole operation went off without a hitch.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still, there may still be Outcasts out here looking to cause trouble for the convoy. If you run into them, please help us by using your blade.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will. But you be careful too, undercover work is dangerous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. I'm not noble enough to throw my life away. If it looks bad, I'll back off.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hope so.)
